Title: Establishes environmental standards for lead in ambient air and lead contamination in soils and lead dust on floors and window sills
Summary: Establishes environmental standards for lead in ambient air and lead contamination in soils and lead dust on floors and window sills.

ActClause: AN ACT to amend the environmental conservation law and the public health law, in relation to establishing environmental standards for lead in ambient air and lead contamination in soils and lead dust on floors and window sills
